main_text.sentence: KA/KS values were reconstructed for individual branches of the evolutionary tree derived from the Darwin bioinformatics workbench (see Methods) using a distance matrix and ancestral states constructed by the method of Messier and Stewart [39].
Many databases constructed on the GenoList data schema were subsequently constructed (, [11]).
A genome-scale S. cerevisiae metabolic network has been reconstructed [19].
For the latter guideline [33], data could not be reliably reconstructed and is not discussed further.
Heterokaryons were constructed as described in [20].
Genome scale TRNs have been reconstructed for well studied organisms such as Escherichia coli and Saccharomyces cerevisiae [4,5,7,8].
MLV and LVs were constructed as described previously [19,20].

source_text.title: Episodic adaptive evolution of primate lysozymes
